q: '' Reflecting on the Arizona shootings that killed six people and badly wounded John McCain Rep. Gabrielle Giffords , Colin Powell said he was dismayed by the harsh tenor of political debate that some have said may have contributed to the attack. There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do, he said.`` All sorts of nastiness. , will henceforth concentrated on`` strategic projects, in particular working on new products.'' Although Eric Schmidt is stepping down as chief executive, Google said he will take on the role of Executive Chairman, focusing externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership-- all of which are increasingly important given Google's global reach. Internally, he will continue to act as an advisor to Larry and Sergey Brin . WASHINGTON-- Indiana Dick Armey Mike Pence has to be flattered. A group of South Carolina lawmakers stood on the steps of their state Capitol on Wednesday to encourage Mike Pence to run for president. It's not a complicated message, but it's a heartfelt one, said state Dick Armey Kris Crawford.`` We would like him on the ballot.'' Leaders of the conservative movement made the same argument in a letter sent to Mike Pence this week.
